name: Castle Cardians
storyline:
It is a mix of strategy and entertainment.
Choose among 5 unique leaders and over 200 cards. There are lots of things to think about, economic planning and resource management, city building and territory expension, warriors fighting and tower defense.
You will go through a series of well-designed levels with fun events, cute characters and powerful relics.

Daily challenge provides a unique level to challenge each day. Compete with global players and see who will beat more monsters and get a higher score.
summary: Castle Cardians fused card games,roguelike and real time colony defense together. Build your powerful deck, defend the castle and beat invaders.
